channel.title: audible on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in audible on Barefoot Rob

item.title: audible needs too many permissions on Android app
item.description: 23:38 Tuesday 21 August 2018 JST Audible requests too many permissions on Android Audible app. Why do you need my identity? My contacts? My microphone? My call information? Identity Uses one or more of: accounts on the device, profile data Contacts Uses contact information Microphone Uses the device’s microphone(s) Device ID & call information Allows the app to determine the phone number and device IDs, whether a call is active, and the remote number connected by a call
